name: Alabama Bones Adventures - Demo
description:
Please enjoy this short demo and let us know what you think. 

Alabama Bones is a classic point and click adventure game, without the convoluted inventory system or pixel hunting. The familiar storyline comes with a twist: you embark on a journey to return decades of stolen artifacts from museums to their rightful owners.

Controls:

  • Mouse - just point and click to move and interact with objects.
  • Keyboard - use arrow keys to move, space to trigger interactions.

The full game will let you explore locations across continents and solve simple puzzles to return a variety of museum artifacts to their original owners. 

Expected release date is Summer 2023. Any wishlist additions on Steam would really help out and be greatly appreciated, thanks!
